participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.

content.text: oh young people   the holidays are coming   that makes me sad
